tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_moisture_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  location TEXT,
  moisture_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE soil_moisture_data ( 
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensor_location TEXT, 
  soil_moisture_level FLOAT, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_devices ( 
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  device_name TEXT, 
  device_type TEXT, 
  activation_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE analyzed_data ( 
  analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensor_id UUID, 
  analysis_result TEXT, 
  analyzed_by TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    startTime TIME,
    duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SoilMoistureData(sensor_id)
);
